title: How to download my entire Apple music library - Quora

response.answer_text: How many songs in your Apple Music library? There is a limit of 25,000 songs. Please make sure you have enough storage to download those songs. Apple Music lets you download any available songs, albums, or playlists you want to your devices. Just go to a song or album, then tap the three-dot button to see more options, and select the download button to download it to your device (and library). There’s no limit to what you can keep offline or for how long. You can also tap the “+” to add a song to your library and then tap it again to download it.
